name: Elemental Ninja
description:
PLAY IT ON FULLSCREEN

Want to play platformer game but as ninja ? Try it !

We are Angeline, Alex, and Anatha. The three of us created this game so you can try to play platformer as a ninja. Also, this is for our university project.

THIS IS ONLY FOR UNIVERSITY PROJECT  (GAME PROGRAMMING) AND PORTOFOLIO. WE WON'T USE IT FOR ANYTHING ELSE. 
Assets (Art) Credits :
1. Ninja Character - Ninja Adventure by Game Art 2D - https://www.gameart2d.com/ninja-adventure---free-sprites.html

2. Tileset/Tilemap - Greenzone Tileset by Craftpix.net - https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-green-zone-tileset-pixel-art/

3.  Shuriken (All Element) - Shuriken Throwing stars by Loel - https://opengameart.org/content/shuriken-pixel-art

4. Scrolls - Elemental Scrolls by Clint Bellanger - https://opengameart.org/content/elemental-scrolls

5. Japan old House - Japan Clipart Old House Japanese by Uttam Vaishnav - https://www.kindpng.com/imgv/iixwRwi_japan-clipart-old-house-japanese-drawing-te...

6. Finish Flags - Banner by hansolo - https://opengameart.org/content/banner-0

7. Hearts - Heart by ChickenTeddy - https://opengameart.org/content/heart-full-and-empty-for-health

8. Settings Icon - Gear free icon by  Flaticon - https://www.flaticon.com/premium-icon/gear_484613?term=settings&page=1&position=... 

9. Flamethrower - Sprite Sheet of Fire by Anna Mozgovets - https://www.shutterstock.com/image-vector/sprite-sheet-fire-torch-animation-game...

10. Cave Background - Cave Background by Pukahuna - https://www.deviantart.com/pukahuna/art/Cave-Background-584380837

11. Cave Entrance - A Cave Stock Vector Image by interactimages - https://depositphotos.com/51680903/stock-illustration-a-cave.html

12. Shinto Shrine Torii Gate - Torii Gate Landmark of Shinto Shrine Japan by brgfx - https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/torii-gate-landmark-shinto-shrine-japan_1626...

Assets (Music/Sounds) Credits :

1. In Game Music - No Copyright Beautiful Relaxing Bamboo Flute Music by Relaxation - 

2. Throwing Shuriken Sound - Throwing a Knife or Shuriken, Spin Fast Through Air 5 - Throwing a knife or Shuriken, spin fast through air 5

3. Run Sound - Football, Soccer Boot Single Footstep, Run on Grass 1 - https://www.zapsplat.com/music/football-soccer-boot-single-footstep-run-on-grass...

4. Death/Taking Damage Sound, Game over Sound, Winning Sound, Switching Shuriken Sound, Jump Sound, Getting Scroll Sound, Getting Heart Sound - Casual Game Sounds - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
